name: Spoopball
description:
Welcome to Spoopball Cemetery! 

It is Halloween and it is time for the Ghosts to come out and play! Send the Spoopball flying into Pumpkins, Gravestones, and the ghosts that haunt the graveyard! Hit all 5 ghosts as they do their unique behaviors and earn an extra ball!

As you play you will unlock further bonuses to increase your high scores such as point multipliers and bonus Spoopballs! 

Major Features

  • Pinball Action! Explore all the different stage interactions!
  • Gameplay that ramps up the longer you can stay alive!
  • Highscore Tracking
  • Lifetime Tracking
  • Meet the Ghosts! Hitting them enough times will unlock new information about them!
  • Keyboard or Controller

Halloween felt like the perfect time to 'complete' something as a fun gift for everyone :D Please post your highest scores and see if you can beat the top score I got while testing!
